message: Let's make a deal quickly, Bob. Every round costs you money!
Let's split it fairly, Alice. A 50/50 split seems fair, but considering the inflation, I need a bit more to make it worthwhile.
I'm being generous, Bob. Take this offer before inflation eats your share even more!
Alice, this is my final offer.  I'm taking a significant hit from inflation with each round, and this split seems fair considering the circumstances.
